parameter.name: config_4
parameter.label: 4: Selective Reporting
parameter.description: Enable selective reporting only when power change reaches a certain threshold or percentage set in 4-11 below. This is used to reduce network traffic.

parameter.name: config_5
parameter.label: 5: Current Threshold - Whole strip
parameter.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Whole HEM). (Valid values 0-60000)

parameter.name: config_6
parameter.label: 6: Current Threshold - Socket 1
parameter.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 1). (Valid values 0-60000)

parameter.name: config_7
parameter.label: 7: Current Threshold - Socket 2
parameter.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 2). (Valid values 0-60000)

parameter.name: config_8
parameter.label: 8: Current Threshold - Socket 3
parameter.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 3). (Valid values 0-60000)

parameter.name: config_9
parameter.label: 9: Current Threshold - Socket 4
parameter.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 4). (Valid values 0-60000)

parameter.name: config_10
parameter.label: 10: Current Threshold - Socket 5
parameter.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 5). (Valid values 0-60000)

parameter.name: config_11
parameter.label: 11: Current Threshold - Socket 6
parameter.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 6). (Valid values 0-60000)

parameter.name: config_12
parameter.label: 12: Percent Change - Whole Strip
parameter.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Whole Smart Strip). (Valid values 0-100)

parameter.name: config_13
parameter.label: 13: Percent Change - Socket 1
parameter.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 1). (Valid values 0-100)

parameter.name: config_14
parameter.label: 14: Percent Change - Socket 2
parameter.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 2). (Valid values 0-100)

parameter.name: config_15
parameter.label: 15: Percent Change - Socket 3
parameter.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 3). (Valid values 0-100)

parameter.name: config_16
parameter.label: 16: Percent Change - Socket 4
parameter.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 4). (Valid values 0-100)

parameter.name: config_17
parameter.label: 17: Percent Change - Socket 5
parameter.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 5). (Valid values 0-100)

parameter.name: config_16
parameter.label: 16: Percent Change - Socket 6
parameter.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 6). (Valid values 0-100)

parameter.name: config_80
parameter.label: 80: Status of load changed
parameter.description: Status of load changed,send group 1 associate nodes Hail CC or Basic report CC.

parameter.name: config_90
parameter.label: 90: Get Temperature
parameter.description: Get temperature of Smart Strip (Only GET is valid)

parameter.name: config_100
parameter.label: 100: Reset 0x65~0x67 to default value
parameter.description: Reset 0x65~0x67 to default value

parameter.name: config_101
parameter.label: 101: Which reports need to send automatically for Group 1

parameter.name: config_102
parameter.label: 102: Which reports need to send automatically for Group 2

parameter.name: config_103
parameter.label: 103: Which reports need to send automatically for Group 3

parameter.name: config_111
parameter.label: 111: Interval to send out reports of Group 1
parameter.description: null

parameter.name: config_112
parameter.label: 112: Interval to send out reports of Group 2
parameter.description: null

parameter.name: config_113
parameter.label: 113: Interval to send out reports of Group 3
parameter.description: null
